Multiple product colors shown for reference.

sound perfected for you

Get the best listening experience in gaming and music on HS65 SURROUND with SoundID from Sonarworks. Integrated into CORSAIR iCUE software, SoundID easily customizes the audio profile of the gaming headset to fit your unique hearing preferences. No more messing with complex sliders, simply take an intuitive preference test to create your perfect sound profile.

learn how it works
Lisa's Profile
Michael's Profile
Tanya's Profile
Tap on the different profiles to see what the sound curves mean.
Example of different sound preferences *SoundID is supported using iCUE software on PC and Mac through the included USB adapter

Ready To Game

HS65 SURROUND is made from premium materials for long-lasting comfort, reinforced with metal construction and details for a quality look and feel while weighing in at only 282g.

PLUSH COMFORT

Adjustable headband with breathable microfiber and leatherette-wrapped memory foam ear pads.

PREMIUM MATERIALS

Durable metal construction and soft-touch exterior.

INTUITIVE CONTROL

On-ear volume roller and flip-to-mute mic to put control within easy reach.

IMMERSIVE
SURROUND AUDIO

High-quality, custom-tuned 50mm neodymium audio drivers deliver excellent sound with the range needed to hear everything on the battlefield. The included USB adapter enables multi-channel Dolby® Audio 7.1 surround sound*, putting you right in the middle of your game.

*Dolby Audio is only available using CORSAIR iCUE software on PC and Mac.

CONNECT TO VIRTUALLY ANY DEVICE

Use the included USB adapter to enable SoundID and Dolby Audio 7.1 surround sound and access other features via CORSAIR iCUE software on PC or Mac. Alternatively, use the 3.5mm jack to easily plug into PC, console, or mobile devices to quickly get into the game.

EFFORTLESS CONTROL

Powerful CORSAIR iCUE software enables custom audio equalizer settings, SoundID personalized audio, Dolby Audio 7.1 surround sound, and more.
